body.name: BLACK+DECKER Portable Dishwasher, 18 inches Wide, 8 Place Setting, Black
features: IMPRESSIVE CAPACITY: This 18” portable dishwasher thoroughly cleans up to 8 place settings in each wash cycle. Your dinner plates, cups, saucers, bowls and utensils will stay dirt-free and sparkling thanks to this durable stainless steel (16.3” x 20.5” x 26.15”) tub. Silverware basket included so your forks, knives and spoons remain immaculate. This portable dishwasher on wheels does the scrubbing for you with an adjustable top rack to accommodate taller dishes.

EASY SETUP: No need for direct plumbing or permanent installation with this portable dishwashing machine. The Quick Connect assembly links right to your faucet with a 59” hose. Interior spray arms located in the upper and lower part of small dishwasher with a hot water temperature of 140° Fahrenheit. Child lock guarantees optimal safety when dishwasher machine is on.

MULTIPLE WASH CYCLES: This BLACK+DECKER portable dish washer comes with 6 superior wash cycles: Heavy, Normal, ECO, Glass, 90-min & Rapid. An easy-to-read LED display with trouble-free push button allows you to begin cleaning in no time. Fully equipped with detergent dispenser and low rise aid indicator. Delay Start function allows you to wash plates, utensils, bowls and cups with the touch of your fingertips and on your own schedule.

WORKTOP VERSATILITY: When your dish washer isn’t scrubbing your favorite dishes, it can double as a trendy kitchen island and worktop counter. When not in use, make the most of this stainless steel dishwasher by utilizing it to store kitchen appliances or even as a culinary work station.

IDEAL FOR SMALL KITCHENS: Just because you live in an apartment, RV, or dorm doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy clean cutlery and plateware. The storage and ease of this 18” RV dishwasher allows you the luxury of thoroughly washed dishes regardless of your kitchen size. Made for compact spaces, this portable dishwasher is ideal for apartment residencies and occupants of modest dwellings.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hello Ease & Convenience, Goodbye Dirty Dishes You won’t ever have to spend countless hours washing dishes by hand again with the BLACK+DECKER 18” Portable Dishwasher! This Energy Star appliance is ideal for small spaces with its stylish working countertop and thoughtfully equipped with an LED display featuring remaining cycle time and delay start time of 1 hour increments, up to 24 hours.Let this portable 18” dishwasher do the washing for you while you can go about your day, assured your dishes are thoroughly sanitized and cleaned. With Hi Temp and Heated Dry options, you can leave your home to run errands and return with fully washed and dried dishes just in time for dinner. Its 8 place-setting capacity means you can clean far more dishes at once than you ever could by hand. Give your hands a break and select one of the featured 6 wash programs do the scrubbing for you.

Perfect for Smaller Kitchens Virtually smokeless indoor grilling that helps bring the BBQ inside. Perfect for year round grilling that avoids cold winters and rainy days, this smokeless grill brings healthy and savory grilling inside the kitchen. Lets you grill all your favorite meats, meals and dishes indoors with little-to-no smoke. The Betty Crocker electric grill also provides a healthier cooking substitute over frying, broiling and baking.

Small Space Portability with Large Capacity Fits snugly into smaller kitchens and apartments with dimensions of 17.64” x 23.62” x 35.63”Doubles as countertop/kitchen island8 place-setting capacity so you don’t have to wash any by hand6 wash programs: Heavy, Normal, ECO, Glass, 90 min & Rapid“Quick Connect” assembly requiring only a faucet—no need for direct plumbing!Child Lock ensuring 100% family friendly

Quality Made & Built to Last Highly durable stainless-steel tub interiorLow rinse aid indicatorHi Temp & Heated Dry OptionsAdjustable upper rack to accommodate taller dishesUpper and lower spray armsHot water temperature of inlet hose4 casters total, front two locking Superior Attributes for a Superb Performance 3-part filtering system to prevent food and other objects from getting inside the pump that’s permanent, washableFaucet adaptor included inside dishwasherSilverware basket to ensure utensils are immaculately cleanedPowerfully effective lower spray arm on interior bottom of compartmentConvenient detergent and rinse aid dispenser with 4 settingsHot water temperature of up to 140 FahrenheitMade for plate diameters of up to 10” Remarkable Features, Extraordinary Craftsmanship 116 lbs.59” power cord length52 db1100W, 120V/60HZ9.14 working amps, 0.74 start up amps265 Kwh annual energy usage59” inlet hose length, 59” outlet hose length

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall this was a great purchase! It’s on the small side but that’s a plus for me.. I needed something that wouldn’t take up space this was ideal. Runs well, minimal noise and cleans well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Causing problems in every step
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like the Black Decker portable washer and bought this Black Decker dishwasher. However, the parts are cheap looking and the product doesn’t even work. 1) Delivery: the package arrived carelessly in the hallway of the building, boxes all beaten up and doesn’t even have the label Fragile. 2) There are plenty of dents and one is remarkably large. It must have been because the package wasn’t even labeled Fragile. 3) Adapter to faucet is not working causing water flowing out when in use. I had to use my own faucet adapter. 4) Water pouring out the drainage hose when the machine in use, causing water damage to my floor. Again, it must have been because misalignment in the design of the parts. It has been a nightmare experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this machine. It is perfect for a single person who hates doing dishes. Unfortunately my machine arrived with 2 huge dents. The box was perfect so i have to wonder if the seller is offloading damaged items. Since it does not seem to be leaking I will not return it but for the price I expect better.In my 2 photos you can see it is just being unpacked. Still sitting on Styrofoam. The dents are worse than pictures show. Its hard to get a picture on the shiny black surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping, works well. Fits my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Same problems as the other reviews but need more use for an accurate rating
reviews.reviewText: I bought a countertop dishwasher against my better judgement. Repackaged and sent it back same day lol. I read all the reviews on this 18" portable (rolling) dishwasher and was prepared for all possible disappointments. Like MANY reviews, the box was destroyed when it arrived. If I have to send it back I will need a new foam bottom. The female adapter broke while installing. I replaced the cheap, broken plastic with a new metal fitting and used a hose clamp for cheap, but should not have had to! They should send an extra hose system to each customer! Also, the plastic inside the back wall that positions the male adapter is very loose. I think it's missing a screw because that's is a tiny hole and i am 90% sure it's for a screw. The dishwasher cleans well, but heat dry is too short to dry the dishes. I did not use a rinse aid and I did not have spots on my silverware. I haven't washed glasses yet. It fits what we need as family of three with normal sized dinnerware and pots. No buying small dishes like people do for the countertop variety. I even got a stock pot in on the bottom with plates and the utensil basket 😀 I've only used it once, so time will tell. I will update in a while, after I have either fallen in love with it like I did my RCA portable clothes washer, or, when I've had enough of the troubles brought to my day by this nearly $600 machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well pleased with Amazon and this product
reviews.reviewText: Amazon has been amazing. They sent me a defective model and I contacted them by chat. They did not give me any flack but sent out a new one immediately. And they arranged to have the bad one picked up from my house at no charge. They even gave me a 100.00 rebate because the price dropped since I bought it. It is very small but holds all the dishes very compactly. I can hardly hear it run. My only gripe is that it takes 3 hours to run when I have it set on normal with heated dry and high heat. I haven't tried the other modes yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Such a shame! When I received this dishwasher, I loved it! It washed the dishes perfectly. BUT it didn't come with the correct hose hook. I contacted Black & Decker 7 times in 3 months in hopes there was finally a tracking number, but was let down every time! Within the 1st month I contacted Amazon and they were great about it. They put notes in my account concerning the missing part and told me if it doesn't come, then I can return it. We'll I ended up returning a perfectly good dishwasher because the company wouldn't send a $5 part. On my last call to black & decker, I expressed my disappointment over this and the lady tried telling me I CANT return it because they won't let me. I told them it's already set up and it's not up to them. If you read reviews here and on other sites about this model, others had the exact issue so Instead I purchased the SPT dishwasher. It's the same setup but it came with the correct hook. Oh and the new dishwasher has a drying cycle unlike black & decker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My dishes are easily cleaned in the dishwasher. I can do other things while the washer is running because it only takes one and a half to two hours to wash. Once you use the button manual for a while, it becomes incredibly simple to operate. The one drawback, in my opinion, is that installing the "easy connect" is a little awkward because you essentially have to lay down on the floor to attach the hose from the dishwasher's base to the faucet.

Delivery was difficult. Had to assist the delivery person in bringing it up on flight of apartment stairs, which is a dangerous activity for which I'm not insured. The box was damaged, had to sweep styrofoam pieces from the apartment hallway, stairs, and even the front of the building outside.And now one of my wheels is crooked, tilting the whole machine. Just reached out to manufacturer for spare part.Have not tested machine yet, will update review as needed.FEB 4: Spare part not yet received. Have not yet been able to test machine, and latest return date is 10 days from now. Super upsetting.
